content: this super cute pattern will walk you through step-by-step on how to make you very own crochet leggy frog the pattern is in pdf form with lots of pictures and my e-mail is listed for questions this pattern uses around half a ball of the mc and much less of the other colors it is a great yarn stash buster the finished frog is approximately 8 long and 3 wide this is a copycat pattern entirely made by me based off of looking at inspiration pictures i choose to share it for free with you all but please do not take credit for my work and share the link to my ravelry page instead
